title: Revault - world¥s first wearable private cloud. Securely sync and access your files from anywhere without an internet connection.
objective:
Revault - world¥s first wearable private cloud. Securely sync and access your files from anywhere without an Internet connection. Revault is worn as a watch or as a bracelet. 

Revault is a storage device communicating via WI-FI and Blue Tooth that has the size of a wrist watch but that can be worn as a watch, necklace or with a key chain.
Revault is creating a totally new position within wearable tech industry, which we call Private Cloud.

A community of 2 100 people from all over the world, has giving us input in the product creation process, showing that there is a real market demand for our solution.
